Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small LieTripleSystem AllSmallLieTripleSystem is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic LieTripleSystem of orders 2 to 3.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallLieTripleSystem">
The output lietriplesystem are represented by its operation table for *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small LieTripleSystem
"IsASmallLieTripleSystem" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic LieTripleSystem of orders 2 to 3. It returns true if the model is a Small LieTripleSystem, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallLieTripleSystem">
